payload_spawn_delay.description: The time from spawn until it should spawn the payload.

payload_deploy_delay.description: The time from payload spawn until it should deploy the payload.

node.description: [string]The node to attach the payload to.

spawn_animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to trigger on spawn.

payload_removed_animation_event.description: [string]The animation event to trigger when the payload have been removed.

decay_after_payload_removed.description: [bool]True if this entity should start decaying after the payload have been removed.
